description: Sandwich raspberry ice-cream between white chocolate cookies, then dip in melted dark chocolate to make a yummy, make-ahead frozen dessert.
name: ChocRaspberry IceCream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halfdip ice-cream sandwiches into chocolate and return to tray. Freeze for 2 minutes or until chocolate has set. Transfer ice-cream sandwiches to a freezer-proof airtight container and keep frozen until ready to serve.
